data.title: ✈ 10-, 11-, or 12-Day Dubai/South Africa w/Air – Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Shop at luxury shopping malls and relax on the beach in Dubai, then head to South Africa to look at wildlife or view Cape Town’s landmarks

data.title: ✈ 10-Day Tour of India with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: Explore one of the world’s largest cities and visit the Taj Mahal on this 10-day tour of India; airfare and premium hotels are included

data.title: ✈ 11- or 13-Day China/Thailand Tour w/Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: See ancient temples, modern sports complexes, and quaint water villages during a guided tour of China and Thailand with included airfare

data.title: ✈ 11-Day Qatar and Thailand Trip w/Air from Great Value Vacations
data.shortDescription: Qatar and Thailand vacation with an open itinerary that allows travelers to visit art museums and ancient temples at their own leisure

data.title: ✈ 11-Day Tour of the Balkans with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: See one of the world’s largest churches and the castle that inspired Dracula’s on this 11-day tour of Bulgaria, Serbia, and Romania

data.title: ✈ 12-Day Tour of China with Air from InterTrips
data.shortDescription: This tour takes you to the Great Wall of China and other famous attractions, with stops including Beijing and Shanghai

data.title: ✈ 12-Day Tour of Turkey with Air from Keytours Vacations
data.shortDescription: Visit Turkey’s legendary ancient cities and sites, including Troy, on this 12-day tour; airfare and luxurious hotels are included

data.title: ✈ 17-Day Mt. Everest Base Camp Trek w/ Air from Encounters Travel
data.shortDescription: This 17-day trek to Mount Everest base camp takes you past villages and Buddhist monasteries, offering great views of the Himalayas

data.title: ✈ 7-Day Bangkok Vacation with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: Explore the Thai capital’s bustling markets, centuries-old temples, and lively nightlife on this 7-day Bangkok vacation; air is included

data.title: ✈ 7-Day Dubai Vacation with Hotel and Air from Emirates Vacations
data.shortDescription: Explore Dubai’s spice market or go skiing in one of the largest malls in the world; some options include 5-star hotels

data.title: ✈ 7-Day Egypt w/Air and Optional Cruise from Keytours Vacations
data.shortDescription: See the Great Pyramids of Giza on this 7-day Egypt tour; depending on the option you choose, you’ll also cruise on the Nile

data.title: ✈ 8- or 11-Day Vietnam Tour with Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Explore two Vietnamese cities and cruise on Halong Bay during an 8-day tour; choose an 11-day option to add a tour of Taipei, Taiwan

data.title: ✈ 8-Day Beijing & Hong Kong Tour w/Air from Rewards Travel China
data.shortDescription: See Beijing’s ancient and modern sites and explore Hong Kong’s glittering skyscrapers on this vacation with air; no visa required

data.title: ✈ 8-Day Maldives Vacation with Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Relax in a beachfront villa at a 4-star resort in the Maldives, where you’ll get to enjoy all-inclusive food and drinks

data.title: ✈ 8-Day Thailand Vacation with Air from Indus Travels
data.shortDescription: Spend your time how you want on this 8-day Thailand trip, such as visiting ornate temples in Bangkok and lounging on Krabi’s idyllic beaches

data.title: ✈ 8-Day Tour of Jordan with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: Float in the Dead Sea and ride through the Wadi Rum desert—known as Valley of the Moon—on this 8-day tour of Jordan; air is included

data.title: ✈ 9- or 10-Day Dubai & Maldives w/ Air from Great Value Vacations
data.shortDescription: Explore the high-end shopping and luxury lifestyle of Dubai, then unwind amidst the Maldives’ white-sand beaches and coral reefs

data.title: ✈ 9- or 12-Day Bali and Singapore w/Air from Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Unwind on two islands in Southeast Asia with this 9- or 12-day vacation in Bali and Singapore

data.title: ✈ 9-Day Tour of Russia with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: See iconic landmarks like Red Square and savor traditional Russian dishes like chicken Kiev on this 9-day tour of Moscow and St. Petersburg

data.title: ✈ 9-Day Tour of Sri Lanka with Air from Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Tour of the island country of Sri Lanka visits an elephant orphanage and spice garden, includes free time for optional tours
